data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4.1, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 3
data.expected_result: Only one modal should open when clicking on the button.
data.short_description: Clicking multiple times on the enable 2FA requirement button opens multiple modals
data.steps_to_repro: - Be an owner of a server - Go to server settings - Open "Security" - Click multiple times as fast as you can "Enable server-wide 2FA requirement"
